items.sentence: Don\'t do anything that you might regret later.
Do you mind if I ask you a couple of questions?
I\'ve been teaching Tom how to play the guitar.
If Tom had seen anything, he would\'ve told us.
Will you look after our pets while we\'re away?
I assure you I\'ve considered that possibility.
We need to make sure Tom doesn\'t hurt himself.
Tom did say that he didn\'t want to go with us.
Tom didn\'t believe that Mary would lie to him.
Tom didn\'t care whether Mary liked him or not.
